General.Name: Neo Battery Materials Ltd
General.Description: NEO Battery Materials Ltd. focus on manufacturing of silicon anode materials for electric vehicle lithium-ion batteries in Canada. The company was formerly known as Pan Andean Minerals Ltd. and changed its name to NEO Battery Materials Ltd. in March 2021. NEO Battery Materials Ltd. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 838 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 0A6
